StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthlyTCContactsRpt]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int = null, @StartDt date.me, @EndDt date.me )
AS BEGIN -- Declare the return variable here DECLARE @Result int DECLARE @TargetDay DateTime DECLARE @Prior90Days DateTime DECLARE @DayValue int
SELECT pc.ProspectId, p.NwaId, per.LastName + ',' + per.FirstName [Name], 'TC' Ac.vity, p.Source, hs.HighSchool_Name [School], rp.Rank_Code + ' ' + pr.Last_Name [Recruiter], pp.PhoneNumber [Telephone]
FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps on pc.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p on p.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_PERSON rp on rp.rowguid = p.Recrui.ngPersonId INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.PERSON pr on pr.Person_Id = rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person per on per.PersonId = p.PersonId Le. JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone pp on pp.PersonId = per.PersonId and pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'NA', 'NH', 'NHCB', 'NHLM') AND pc.IsApproved = 1 AND pc.ProspectDate >= @StartDt and pc.ProspectDate <= @EndDt AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT p2.ProspectId FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p2 ON s.subjectId = pc.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND p2.ProspectId= pc.ProspectId AND StartDate < pc.ProspectDate AND StartDate >= DateAdd(day, -90, pc.ProspectDate))
END
